channel.title: Stephan Schwab
channel.description: As International Software Development Coach and Trainer I offer to CEOs and Department Leaders technical and organizational team coaching as a professional service to improve the value creation chain within their organization and to improve the quality of the product they are making.

item.title: Flowing Seasonal Creek
item.description: After some 50 liters of rain over the last two days I went out with the camera to document how the seasonal #creek looks like. The YouTube community around Project Granja Caimito had been making a lot of good suggestions on how to improve that creek for better #water #retention and today was a great opportunity to add some real world data to it and show how past modifications of the creek work with flowing water.
